body_html:
I have the exact same problem, just running Tensorflow (not building it):
ImportError: dlopen(/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.5/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so, 10): Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.8.0.dylib
Referenced from: /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.5/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so
Reason: image not found

MacOS 10.12.2
Using an eGPU
DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=:/usr/local/cuda/lib
ls -al /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart*
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.dylib
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a

Disabling SIP fixes this
body_text:
I have the exact same problem, just running Tensorflow (not building it):
ImportError: dlopen(/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.5/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so, 10): Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.8.0.dylib
Referenced from: /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.5/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so
Reason: image not found
MacOS 10.12.2
Using an eGPU
DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=:/usr/local/cuda/lib
ls -al /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart*
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib

/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a
Disabling SIP fixes this
body:
I have the exact same problem, just running Tensorflow (not building it):
ImportError: dlopen(/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.5/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so, 10): Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.8.0.dylib
  Referenced from: /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.5/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so
  Reason: image not found

MacOS 10.12.2
Using an eGPU
DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=:/usr/local/cuda/lib
ls -al /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart*
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.dylib -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart.dylib
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a -> /Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-8.0/lib/libcudart_static.a

Disabling SIP fixes this
